LanguageData.OpenCleaningPriorityDialog: Open cleaning priorities window.\n\nHere you can set which areas colonists will clean first, last or anything in between.
LanguageData.AddAreaAsCleaningArea: Click to add an area to prioritize for cleaning.\n\nIf you are confused about which areas are prioritized, hover over each area in the list and read the tooltips.
LanguageData.AddAreaForPriorityCleaningTip: Add an area for colonists to clean.
LanguageData.CleaningAreaIsPrioritized: Cleaning colonists will clean filth in this area.\n\n
LanguageData.OnlyCleaningArea: Only filth in this area will be cleaned.
LanguageData.CleaningAreaFirst: Filth in this area will be cleaned first.
LanguageData.CleaningAreaLast: Filth in this area will the cleaned last.
LanguageData.CleaningAreaMiddle: Filth in this area will be cleaned after filth in {0} and before filth in {1}
